    • Uses of PermissionFilter in com.communote.plugins.activity.base.permission

      Classes in com.communote.plugins.activity.base.permission that implement PermissionFilter 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ActivityNotePermissionFilter
      Permission filter which removes the DELETE permission of notes that are activities and belong to an activity type which does not allow the deletion.
